title: Data about students at East and West High schools

content.description: Which of the following can be done with the combined data?
content.question: Select two answers.

choices.label: The schools can create a single list of student names, sorted by last name.
The schools can determine the average number of days students are absent.
The schools can determine which ZIP code is represented by the most students.
The schools can determine the student ID of the student with the greatest number of absences.

content.answer: The schools can create a single list of student names, sorted by last name.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how knowledge can be generated from data.
